title: Super easy doughnuts
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons white vinegar', '90ml milk', '25g butter or baking fat', '100g caster sugar', '1 egg', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '250g sifted plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1 L oil for deep frying', '60g caster sugar or icing sugar for dusting']
